ComicInfo.Title: Space Case; Dance Class; The White Ship; The Divisible Man; Enigma Funnies; The Marine Jockey
ComicInfo.Summary:
Guadalupe tries to find out if the sky goes on forever.
Chuckie-Boy has a stomach ache and Girly Girl gives him stuff that should make him throw up but instead makes him better.
Popeye gets lost in the desert while on the way to Hoofney's ranch.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 23:03:04. [Issue ID 42841]
